definitions.definition: A personal care beauty treatment which involves cleansing and moisturizing of the human face .
A kind of early silent film focusing on the facial expressions of the actor .
A foul play which involves one player hitting another's face .
A sex act of ejaculation onto another person's face .
examples: Long-Dong Chuck gave his co-star a creamy facial .

main_definition: ( medicine ) A personal care beauty treatment which involves cleansing and moisturizing of the human face .
secondary_definitions: ( film ) A kind of early silent film focusing on the facial expressions of the actor .
( slang , sports ) ( in some contact sports ) A foul play which involves one player hitting another's face .
( slang , pornography , sex ) A sex act of ejaculation onto another person's face .
